document.full_text: andy roddick began his bid for a record fifth title at queen's club on tuesday by defeating 2010 semifinalist feliciano lopez 7-6 (2), 6-7 (5), 6-4.
document.title: roddick edges lopez at queen's clubs
lines_and_colors: andy roddick began his bid for a record fifth title at queen's club on tuesday by defeating 2010 semifinalist feliciano lopez 7-6 (2), 6-7 (5), 6-4.
